statements: UPDATE StudentAchievements SET award_name = 'Gold Medal' WHERE student_id = 1;

UPDATE StudentAchievements SET award_date = '2022-10-15', student_name = 'Emily Johnson' WHERE student_id = 105;

UPDATE students SET student_name = 'John Doe', graduation_year = 2023 WHERE student_id = 1;
UPDATE achievements SET achievement_date = '2022-05-15', achievement_name = 'Honor Roll' WHERE achievement_id = 1;
